scripts.compile-css-min: node-sass -x -q --output-style compressed --include-path node_modules/bootstrap/scss --include-path node_modules/dragula/dist css/scss/messages_widget.scss css/messages_widget.min.css
scripts.build: npm run build-scripts && npm run compile-css-min && npm run post-css
scripts.watch-css: node-sass -w -x -q --output-style expanded --include-path node_modules/bootstrap/scss --include-path node_modules/dragula/dist css/scss/messages_widget.scss css/messages_widget.css
scripts.watch-css-min: node-sass -w -x -q --output-style compressed --include-path node_modules/bootstrap/scss --include-path node_modules/dragula/dist css/scss/messages_widget.scss css/messages_widget.min.css
scripts.watch: npm run watch-scripts & npm run watch-css & npm run watch-css-min
